description: A rating component that allows users to choose a rating from predefined options

properties.name: allowHalf
properties.description: Whether to allow half-ratings. Only applies to star and heart variants.

properties.name: count
properties.description: The number of rating items to display

properties.name: disabled
properties.description: Whether the rating component is disabled

properties.name: getAriaLabelText
properties.description: Function to provide aria-label text for a given rating-item index

properties.name: size
properties.description: The size of the rating component

properties.name: variant
properties.description: The variant of the rating scale

properties.name: value
properties.description: The current value of the rating

events.name: ratingChange
events.description: Event emitted when the rating changes

examples.basic:
<script>
  const myAriaLabelText = (index) => {
    return 'Custom label for rating item ' + index.toString();
  };
</script>
<modus-wc-rating
  aria-label="Rating scale component"
  allow-half=${ifDefined(args['allow-half'])}
  count=${args.count}
  custom-class="custom-rating-component"
  disabled=${ifDefined(args.disabled)}
  size=${ifDefined(args.size)}
  value=${ifDefined(args.value)}
  variant=${args.variant}
  .getAriaLabelText=${ariaLabelText}
></modus-wc-rating>

storyExample.template:
<script>
  const myAriaLabelText = (index) => {
    return 'Custom label for rating item ' + index.toString();
  };
</script>
<modus-wc-rating
  aria-label="Rating scale component"
  allow-half=${ifDefined(args['allow-half'])}
  count=${args.count}
  custom-class="custom-rating-component"
  disabled=${ifDefined(args.disabled)}
  size=${ifDefined(args.size)}
  value=${ifDefined(args.value)}
  variant=${args.variant}
  .getAriaLabelText=${ariaLabelText}
></modus-wc-rating>
